data.title: Netrunner 12.12 released
data.meta_description: Netrunner Dryland – Third Edition (12.12) has been released. It is based on Kubuntu 12.10 and comes with the following features: GNU/Linux OS kernel-3.5 KDE 4.9.3 Firefox 17 (+KDE integration…
data.text:
Netrunner Dryland – Third Edition (12.12) has been released.

It is based on Kubuntu 12.10 and comes with the following features:

GNU/Linux OS kernel-3.5

KDE 4.9.3

Firefox 17 (+KDE integration)

Thunderbird 17

VLC 2.0.4

LibreOffice 3.6.2

Skype 4.1

Gimp 2.8

Krita

Gwenview

Kdenlive

Telepathy Messenger

Samba Mounter (easy NAS setup)

Webaccounts (social accounts integration)

Runners-ID (free and libre cloud storage + music streaming)

Muon Discover

Virtualbox

WINE

and many more

For Download please go to the Download Section.

If you have any questions or need further help, please use our forums.
